description:
A light overshirt for those moments you still want to sit outside but fall is in the air. Blending the style of a classic button-down with the lines of a light jacket, the Camicia is here to help you extend patio season.

  • Light nylon blend has a comfortable stretch and dries quickly
  • Hidden snap-up placket
  • Cross-body pocket with snap-down flap
  • Drawcord at the hem lets you seal the cold out and the warm in
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
name: Indyeva Camicia - Women's
